night_horizons.image_processing.registration module¶

Main module for performing georeferencing

class night_horizons.image_processing.registration.MetadataImageRegistrar(crs: Union[str, CRS] = 'EPSG:3857', passthrough: Union[bool, list[str]] = False, use_direct_estimate: bool = True, camera_angles: dict[float] = {0: 30.0, 1: 0.0, 2: 30.0}, angle_error: float = 5.0, padding_fraction: float = 1.5)¶

Bases: BaseEstimator

Perform georeferencing based on sensor metadata.

crs:

Coordinate reference system to use.
